fields.title: Settlers of Catan
fields.description: In this classic strategy game, players collect resources and use them to build roads, settlements, and cities on their way to victory.

fields.title: Ticket to Ride
fields.description: Players collect train cards to build railway routes connecting cities across a map of the United States.

fields.title: Pandemic
fields.description: In this cooperative game, players work as a team to treat infections around the world while gathering resources for cures.

fields.title: 7 Wonders
fields.description: Players lead an ancient civilization and build its architectural wonders. It's a card drafting game that requires careful planning and strategy.

fields.title: Carcassonne
fields.description: Players place tiles to build a medieval landscape and score points by completing features like cities, roads, and monasteries.

fields.title: Dominion
fields.description: A deck-building game where players use action and treasure cards to accumulate victory points.

fields.title: Codenames
fields.description: A social word game where two teams compete to identify their agents through one-word clues.

fields.title: Scythe
fields.description: An engine-building game set in an alternate-history 1920s period, featuring resource gathering and area control.

fields.title: Azul
fields.description: Players compete to create the most beautiful mosaic on their player board using colorful tiles.

fields.title: Terraforming Mars
fields.description: Players take on the role of corporations working to make Mars habitable through various projects and resource management.

fields.title: Splendor
fields.description: A Renaissance-themed game where players are merchants trying to acquire gem mines, transportation, and shops to gain prestige.

fields.title: King of Tokyo
fields.description: Players control monsters vying to become the King of Tokyo in this dice-rolling battle game.

fields.title: Betrayal at House on the Hill
fields.description: Players explore a haunted house, triggering events that lead to one player becoming a traitor in this cooperative turned competitive game.

fields.title: Small World
fields.description: A fantasy-themed game of conquest where players control various races with unique abilities, vying for control of a world that's too small.

fields.title: Agricola
fields.description: A worker-placement game where players are farmers in 17th century Europe, trying to build the most successful farm.
